heading: HR00330
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT (DILG) TO FULLY IMPLEMENT THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9003 OR THE 'ECOLOGICAL SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT CODE OF 2000' THAT PROHIBITS THE USE OR MANUFACTURE OF NON-ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY PRODUCTS AND PACKAGING AS PART OF THE SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PROGRAM

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT (DILG) TO FULLY IMPLEMENT THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9003 OR THE 'ECOLOGICAL SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT CODE OF 2000' THAT PROHIBITS THE USE OR MANUFACTURE OF NON-ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY PRODUCTS AND PACKAGING AS PART OF THE SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PROGRAM
